resources.string: BlueGrape uses the accessibility permission to detect the currently running application to determine which wallpaper to play, but this is a more advanced permission that the Android system may turn off from time to time. When permissions are turned off, BlueGrape pops up. We apologize for the inconvenience.
An error occurred while loading the wallpaper.
Are you sure to delete the wallpaper?
An error occurred while selecting the video.
An error occurred while selecting the image.
Note: for pictures, will immediately save after select.

Note: for video, because of its large size, the wallpaper will only store its path. This means that if you move or rename (whether renaming the video itself or the parent folder), it will cause the wallpaper to fail.
Short press to see details, long press to cancel application.
This is a necessary permission for BlueGrape to run and to detect which window it is currently in to determine which wallpaper to play.

After the program needs barrier-free access to obtain the currently used application, decide whether to display wallpaper and which wallpaper to display, please find \"BlueGrape\" in the list and turn on the permission manually.

The Android system has turned off the accessibility service of the program, which may not be your intention. Turn on accessibility settings? Please turn on permissions manually after finding \"BlueGrape\" in the list. If you think this dialog pops up too often, you can stop BlueGrape from running.
The program requires \"Draw over other apps\" permission to display wallpaper. Please authorize.
Check for updates (not from Google Play)
Checking for updates, click in the space to cancel.
Crash testing is used to deliberately trigger the crash to upload logs to Bugly (an analysis service of China\'s Tencent), only if there is something wrong with the software.
GIF is not supported. But this website may be helpful to you:
Note that you are on a mobile data network, and continuing to download will consume traffic. Do you really want to continue?
The wallpaper download has been cancelled.
An error occurred while downloading the wallpaper.
An error occurred while decompressing the wallpaper. Maybe the wallpaper can still be used.
The installation package is being downloaded.
Failed to download the installation package.
The installation package download has been cancelled.

Sorry, BlueGrape encountered an error. When connected to the Internet, the Bugly plug-in, an analytical product of Tencent of China, will upload error details to help developers fix the problem. You can contact bilibili (a Chinese video website) or Youtube@cyrxdzj. In addition, please check the official website, there may be an update of the version of BUG that has been fixed.
BlueGrape is open source software, with open source code hosted on Gitee and Github. If you are an open source developer, you are welcome to submit ISSUE or Pull Requests.
Please give the project a Star and Watch.
